channel.title: Looking for a Regalia
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looking for a Regalia"

item.title: Re: Looking for a Regalia
item.content:encoded: Well I have 1 now, However I did have someone trading for 175 smokebomb so all you nay sayers :)

item.title: Re: Looking for a Regalia
item.content:encoded: i would give 150 smoke bombs for a regalia,though i already have 3.not braging,but even though smoke bombs are more valueable then before,regalia is still one of 2 of the best kaiju drops,so i think its cheap,but if you can get it go for itâ€¦

item.title: Re: Looking for a Regalia
item.content:encoded: my kage is the one that said around 150 smoke bombs would be good enough for a regalia and I'll have 100 tomorrow so if anyone else has anything to say that would be helpfull and not just wasting my time reading a reply thanks

item.title: Re: Looking for a Regalia
item.content:encoded: people don't usually trade monster drops for regular items, at least not for the good ones anyway. If you tried to get enough smokebombs you'd waste some much time you could've spent getting a ton of other perms that are just related to playing the game.

item.title: Looking for a Regalia
item.content:encoded: Looking for someone to trade smokebombs for A regalia and how many would you need for it?
